{{Infobox dungeon |name = Granite Cave |image = [[File:Granite Cave.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Granite Cave |tokens = 16,000 |location = South of Route 106. }} '''Granite Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 210,000 |- | Boss || 660,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Abra * Geodude * Makuhita * Aron * Sableye * Mawile (boss) * Nosepass (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
